PrivacyNotice.this_notice_provides_transparent_informa: This notice provides transparent information about:
PrivacyNotice.the_types_of_personal_data_we_collect: ‚Ä¢ The types of personal data we collect
PrivacyNotice.the_reasons_we_process_your_data: ‚Ä¢ The reasons we process your data
PrivacyNotice.the_legal_grounds_for_that_processing: ‚Ä¢ The legal grounds for that processing
PrivacyNotice.your_rights_as_a_data_principal_under_th: ‚Ä¢ Your rights as a Data Principal under the DPDPA
PrivacyNotice.how_you_can_take_control_of_your_persona: ‚Ä¢ How you can take control of your personal data
PrivacyNotice.information_you_provide_directly_through: Information you provide directly through forms and interactions
PrivacyNotice.automatically_collected_data_to_improve_: Automatically collected data to improve your experience
PrivacyNotice.you_re_in_complete_control_of_your_conse: You're in complete control of your consent preferences and can withdraw consent at any time.
PrivacyNotice.we_always_weigh_these_interests_against_: We always weigh these interests against your privacy rights with appropriate safeguards.
PrivacyNotice.request_details_about_the_personal_data_: Request details about the personal data we have on you, including what types of data we hold and why we're processing it.
PrivacyNotice.request_corrections_or_updates_if_you_th: Request corrections or updates if you think any personal data we have about you is wrong, outdated, or incomplete.
PrivacyNotice.take_back_your_consent_at_any_time_for_d: Take back your consent at any time for data processing based on consent, such as form submissions.
PrivacyNotice.ask_us_to_delete_your_personal_data_when: Ask us to delete your personal data when it's no longer needed or if you withdraw your consent.
PrivacyNotice.submit_a_complaint_to_our_data_protectio: Submit a complaint to our Data Protection Officer if you're concerned about how your data is being managed.
PrivacyNotice.all_data_transmitted_between_your_browse: All data transmitted between your browser and our website is protected with Secure Socket Layer encryption.
PrivacyNotice.role_based_access_controls_ensure_only_a: Role-based access controls ensure only authorized personnel can access your data, following the principle of least privilege.
PrivacyNotice.our_systems_undergo_regular_security_aud: Our systems undergo regular security audits, vulnerability assessments, and continuous monitoring.
PrivacyNotice.data_is_stored_in_secure_environments_wi: Data is stored in secure environments with controlled access, and sensitive information is encrypted at rest.
PrivacyNotice.our_team_follows_secure_development_prac: Our team follows secure development practices from the ground up
PrivacyNotice.regular_assessment_and_updating_of_secur: Regular assessment and updating of security protocols
PrivacyNotice.solid_response_plan_to_quickly_tackle_po: Solid response plan to quickly tackle potential data breaches
PrivacyNotice.adherence_to_dpdpa_requirements_and_inte: Adherence to DPDPA requirements and international security standards

T&C.terms_of_service_for_admin_portal: Terms of Service for Admin Portal
T&C.you_must_be_an_employee_contractor_or_au: You must be an employee, contractor, or authorized representative of the Company.
T&C.you_must_have_received_formal_approval_f: You must have received formal approval from your manager or system owner to access the Portal.
T&C.you_must_complete_any_required_training_: You must complete any required training or onboarding related to data handling and system administration.
T&C.maintain_system_hygiene_regularly_audit_: Maintain system hygiene: Regularly audit user roles, permissions, and access logs to ensure compliance and minimize risk.
T&C.report_issues_promptly_notify_the_it_or_: Report issues promptly: Notify the IT or Security team immediately if you suspect a breach, data leak, or system malfunction.
T&C.comply_with_applicable_laws_handle_data_: Comply with applicable laws: Handle data in accordance with regulations such as GDPR, DPDPA, or local data protection laws.
T&C.limit_data_exposure_do_not_download_expo: Limit data exposure: Do not download, export, or share data unless explicitly authorized and necessary for business operations.
T&C.respect_confidentiality_do_not_disclose_: Respect confidentiality: Do not disclose internal data to external parties or use it for personal gain.
T&C.you_agree_to_use_the_portal_responsibly_: You agree to use the Portal responsibly and ethically. Prohibited activities include:
T&C.unauthorized_access_attempting_to_access: Unauthorized access: Attempting to access systems, data, or features beyond your assigned privileges.
T&C.malicious_behavior_uploading_viruses_mal: Malicious behavior: Uploading viruses, malware, or engaging in activities that disrupt system performance.
T&C.abuse_of_power_using_administrative_priv: Abuse of power: Using administrative privileges to harass, intimidate, or discriminate against users.
T&C.automation_misuse_deploying_bots_scripts: Automation misuse: Deploying bots, scripts, or tools that interfere with normal Portal operations or violate usage limits.
T&C.we_reserve_the_right_to_suspend_or_termi: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Portal under the following conditions:
T&C.policy_violations_breach_of_these_terms_: Policy violations: Breach of these Terms, internal policies, or applicable laws.
T&C.security_concerns_suspected_compromise_o: Security concerns: Suspected compromise of your account or unauthorized activity.
T&C.role_changes_transfer_resignation_or_ter: Role changes: Transfer, resignation, or termination of employment that no longer requires administrative access.
T&C.operational_needs_system_upgrades_audits: Operational needs: System upgrades, audits, or restructuring that necessitate access changes.
T&C.suspension_or_termination_may_occur_with: Suspension or termination may occur without prior notice in cases of urgent security or compliance risks.
T&C.copy_or_redistribute_do_not_reproduce_or: Copy or redistribute: Do not reproduce or share Portal content outside authorized channels.
T&C.reverse_engineer_do_not_attempt_to_decom: Reverse-engineer: Do not attempt to decompile, disassemble, or extract source code from the Portal.
T&C.use_for_external_purposes_do_not_use_por: Use for external purposes: Do not use Portal materials for personal projects, commercial ventures, or non-business activities.
T&C.unauthorized_use_of_intellectual_propert: Unauthorized use of intellectual property may result in legal action and termination of access.
T&C.the_portal_is_provided_as_is_and_as_avai: The Portal is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù and ‚Äúas available.‚Äù While we strive to maintain high availability and performance, we do not guarantee:
T&C.uninterrupted_access_the_portal_may_be_s: Uninterrupted access: The Portal may be subject to maintenance, outages, or technical issues.
T&C.error_free_operation_bugs_glitches_or_da: Error-free operation: Bugs, glitches, or data inconsistencies may occur.
T&C.fitness_for_purpose_the_portal_may_not_m: Fitness for purpose: The Portal may not meet every administrative need or expectation.
T&C.we_disclaim_all_warranties_express_or_im: We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
T&C.to_the_maximum_extent_permitted_by_law_p: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Proteccio Data shall not be liable for:
T&C.indirect_or_consequential_damages_includ: Indirect or consequential damages: Including loss of data, revenue, or business opportunities.
T&C.user_errors_mistakes_made_by_administrat: User errors: Mistakes made by administrators that result in data loss or system misconfiguration.
T&C.security_breaches_arising_from_negligenc: Security breaches: Arising from negligence, credential sharing, or failure to follow security protocols.
T&C.your_sole_remedy_for_dissatisfaction_wit: Your sole remedy for dissatisfaction with the Portal is to discontinue use.
T&C.these_terms_shall_be_governed_by_the_law: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these Terms or use of the Portal shall be resolved through:
T&C.internal_resolution_mediation_or_arbitra: Internal resolution: Mediation or arbitration as per company policy.
T&C.legal_proceedings_if_necessary_in_the_co: Legal proceedings: If necessary, in the courts of Hyderabad, India.
T&C.you_agree_to_cooperate_fully_in_any_inve: You agree to cooperate fully in any investigation or legal process related to Portal usage.
T&C.for_questions_concerns_or_support_relate: For questions, concerns, or support related to these Terms or the Admin Portal, please contact:
